item.title: Putin wants direct White House talks before Ukraine ceasefire, but says he is open to deal in principle
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin thanked U.S. President Donald Trump for giving "so much attention" to the prospect of a Russia-Ukraine deal.

item.title: Trump's Treasury chief on 200% EU tariff threat: 'Not sure why that's a big deal' for markets
item.description: Treasury Secretary Bessent did not answer when CNBC asked if Trump's announcement was "premeditated," or whether the Cabinet secretary knew about it i...

item.title: 'God used Donald Trump to save me': Ex-Tenn. senator gets pardon 15 days after entering prison
item.description: The pardon by Trump came after the top pardon attorney at the DOJ said she had been fired after restoring the gun rights of actor Mel Gibson.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump's executive order seeking to punish law firm Perkins Coie
item.description: U.S. District Judge Beryl Howell granted a temporary restraining order sought by the firm, Perkins Coie, after it filed a lawsuit alleging it's being ...

item.title: Canada to impose 25% retaliatory tariffs on $21 billion worth of U.S. goods
item.description: Canada will impose 25% tariffs on more than $20 billion worth of U.S. goods in retaliation for the Trump administration's steel and aluminum duties.
